meanings.definition: According to reputation or general belief
meanings.sent1: She reputedly has the best cookies in town.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant reputedly serves the most delicious pizza.
meanings.sent3: The cat, reputedly a ninja at night, was caught sleeping on the couch.
meanings.sent4: His skills on the guitar are reputedly unmatched in the music industry.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house was reputedly home to a ghostly figure that appeared at midnight.

meanings.sent1: The treasure map reputedly leads to a hidden chest of gold.
meanings.sent2: The old mansion reputedly hides a secret passage in the library.
meanings.sent3: The magician, reputedly a master of illusions, amazed the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: The mysterious stranger reputedly held the key to solving the town's mystery.
meanings.sent5: The potion reputedly granted wishes to those who drank it under the full moon.
